skill_e.tooltip:
Rumble launches an electrified harpoon, dealing 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.4) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of 15/20/25/30/35% for 2 seconds. Rumble can store up to two harpoons at a time, which recharge once every ? seconds (modified by cooldown reduction).

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

skill_i.tooltip: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

skill_q.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing 175/210/245/280/315 (+1.1) magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds. This spell deals 60/65/70/75/80% damage to minions.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals 150% damage.

skill_r.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for ? seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by ?% and take ? magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

skill_w.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for 1.5 seconds that absorbs 60/95/130/165/200 (+0.5) damage. Rumble also gains an additional 15/20/25/30/35% Movement Speed for 1 second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.
